An open-plan area combining living and dining. Large south-eastern window for natural light; designed with economical materials.
Adjacent to the living area, featuring compact yet functional design. Placed in the northeast corner as per Vastu to enhance positive energy.
A cozy and intimate space located on the south-west side of the plot for enhanced privacy; includes built-in storage and minimalistic furnishing.
Serves as a guest room or extra bedroom. Situated towards the northwest, ensuring balance according to Vastu guidelines.
A small living area and basic amenities for domestic help; placed in the far south-east corner of the ground floor to maintain energy flow.

openings.description: Large, inviting door at the north side, ensuring positive energy inflow.
Multiple windows strategically placed in living and kitchen areas for natural light and ventilation. Includes east and south openings per Vastu recommendations.
A small private pool located on the north-east corner of the plot, with direct access from an adjacent corridor.
